column1: [6] The assessor did not allow the tax credit of Rs. 15,945,678/- under section
137 of the IRA 2006, but deducted the said amount from the profits from trade
or business as expenses in the computation of the total statutory income.
Appeal to the Commissioner-General of Inland Revenue
[7] The Appellant appealed  to  the  Commissioner-General of Inland  Revenue
(hereinafter referred to as the Respondent) against the said assessment. The
Respondent by its determination dated 02.12.2015 confirmed the assessment
(Vide- reasons for the determination at pp. 78-80 the Tax Appeals Commission
